announcements.message: We've added new json based approach of adding new modules to reduce the overhead and duplications.
We've added cloud live support for Samco and Zerodha brokerages for India Market
We've added support for Samco brokerage for India Market and FTX.US Exchange
We've added support for Kraken and FTX brokerages

We've just released a new opening video of the CLI:
https://youtube.com/watch?v=QJibe1XpP-U

Building an Algo on Privacy Keywords using TiingoNews:
https://quantconnect.com/blog/building-an-algo-on-privacy-keywords-using-tiingonews/

Check out our mini video series on how to use the CLI:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLD7-B3LE6mz61Hojce6gKshv5-7Qo4y0r
